QuestData.Title: Stopping the Spread
QuestData.Description: Slaying the foul creatures that plague the river will not be enough, $n.$B$BA new generation of these monstrosities already threatens to spawn within our holy waters.$B$BSeek their foul eggs and destroy them.
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you, $n. This will make our prophetic visions that much clearer.
